short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly copy SKUs and check stock on the Competitive Cyclist and Backcountry websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds dropdown on the PLP to choose variants, which displays current stock status, price, and variant name. Click on the variant to copy the SKU to the clipboard. On the PDP, choose a variant and click "Copy SKU" to copy the SKU to the clipboard. Both the PLP and PDP can go straight to the WMS page for the item to check ETAs, stock level, and pricing.
